sections.heading: and ex parte orders; violation; penalty
sections.text: The court may order either party to pay to the clerk of the district court or to the State Disbursement Unit, as provided in section 42-369, a sum of money for the temporary support and maintenance of the other party and minor children if any are affected by t

sections.heading: 1004(1)(d) is more specific than this section on the issue of modification or elimination of temporary spousal support
sections.text: Edwards v. Edwards, 16 Neb. App. 297, 744 N.W.2d 243 (2008).
